alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Haakon, southwestern Ziebach and east central Meade Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles west of Red Scaffold, or 18 miles south of Faith, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Red Scaffold around 405 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Takini and Bridger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach
